steps.step: Melt the butter and set aside to cool.
Whisk together the milk and eggs, then stream in the melted butter while still whisking until incorporated.
Add the liquid ingredients and mix with a spoon just until evenly moistened. A few lumps will remain.
Heat a griddle over medium-high heat until drops of water sprinkled on the surface dance around (425).

Lightly grease the griddle with butter, then pour about 1/4 cup of batter per pancake. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then carefully turn over with a spatula and cook until set. Repeat until all pancakes have been made.

Add 1 cup
blueberries blueberries to the batter. Frozen are fine and usually far cheaper. Do not defrost, but make sure they are all separated.

Use half whole wheat flour and half white flour. Use honey in place of sugar. Add 1 cup
raspberries to the batter. Mix frozen raspberries with the flour before adding the liquids; add fresh raspberries after mixing in the liquid.
